text: John Maeke (born 6 June 1962) is a retired long distance athlete from the Solomon Islands. Maeke was part of the Solomon Island team that compete at the Olympics when he went to the 1988 Summer Olympics which was held in Seoul. He entered the 10,000 metres, he managed to finish 22nd in his heat so didn't manage to reach the final, he also entered the Marathon, but he didn't finish the race .Sports Reference Profile ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of the Solomon Islands Category:Male marathon runners Category:Solomon Islands male long-distance runners
title: John Maeke
